full_summary:
**Title:** Request for Information: Audit of the Performance of the Duties and Functions of Election Officers
**Release Date:** August 8, 2022
**Closing Date:** August 26, 2022, 2:00 PM Eastern Daylight Time
**Procurement Category:** Service
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

**Description:**

Elections Canada is seeking feedback from suppliers regarding its requirement for Audit of the Performance of the Duties and Functions of Election Officers. This audit is mandated by the Canada Elections Act to verify whether election officers exercised their powers and performed duties as required on all days of advance polling and polling day.

The goal of the audit is to refine Elections Canada's requirements, ensuring that the procurement strategy effectively addresses the needs of the organization. Suppliers are invited to provide information on their capabilities, expertise, and experiences in conducting similar audits.

**Instructions for Responding:**

Interested suppliers must refer to the Request for Information (RFI) document, available in English and French, for a comprehensive description of the requirement and instructions for responding. Queries and communications with Elections Canada should be directed to the contracting authority only.

**Submission Requirements:**

* Respondents can submit their responses electronically through the epost Connect service or by email to [supplier@elections.ca](mailto:supplier@elections.ca).
* Responses must be submitted in the official language of choice (English or French) and may include supporting documents.
* The Business Centre is open for package delivery or pickup from 8:00 AM to 12:00 PM and 1:00 PM to 4:00 PM, Eastern Daylight Time.

**Note:**

This RFI is not a solicitation, and respondents will not be pre-qualified or restricted from participating in future solicitations. Elections Canada reserves the right to negotiate with suppliers and to accept or reject any recommendations received.
